results.description: Britain's Lizzie Broughton wins bronze in the K1 26km at the Canoe Marathon World Championships in China.
results.shortTitle: Broughton wins canoe marathon bronze
results.title: Canoe Marathon World Championships: Lizzie Broughton wins bronze

results.description: Stoke's reigning Olympic K1 canoeing champion Joe Clarke says his non-selection for Tokyo 2020 feels 'a bit unjust'.
results.shortTitle: Clarke 'in pieces' over Tokyo omission
results.title: Tokyo 2020: Olympic K1 canoeing champion Joe Clarke left 'in pieces' by non-selection

thumbnail.altText: Following his win in Rio, Stoke's Joe Clarke won a gold and two bronzes at the 2018 Slalom World Championships

results.description: Liam Heath will look to become the first British athlete to retain an Olympic canoeing title, while Joe Clarke misses out on the squad for Tokyo 2020.
results.shortTitle: Olympic champion Heath in Tokyo squad
results.title: Tokyo 2020: GB select Liam Heath but leave out Joe Clarke

results.description: Scots canoeist Eilidh Gibson says she won't give up on her Olympic dreams, despite undergoing shoulder surgery in a "last resort" bid to save her career.
results.shortTitle: Gibson not giving up on Olympic dream
results.title: Eilidh Gibson not giving up on Olympic dreams after 'last resort' shoulder surgery

results.description: Olympic champion Joe Clarke finishes fifth at the Canoe Slalom World Championships putting his Tokyo 2020 qualification in doubt.
results.shortTitle: Olympic champ Clarke set to miss Tokyo
results.title: Joe Clarke: Olympic kayak single champion set to miss Tokyo 2020

results.description: Great Britain claim World Championship gold in the women's K1 Team event for the first time in 10 years in in La Seu d'Urgell, Spain.
results.shortTitle: GB win women's K1 Team gold at Worlds
results.title: Canoe Slalom World Championships: Great Britain win women's K1 Team gold

thumbnail.altText: GB women with their K1 Team gold medals

results.description: Ayomide Bello becomes the first ever female sprint canoeist from Nigeria to qualify for an Olympics.
results.shortTitle: Teen is Nigeria's first female Olympic canoeist
results.title: Tokyo 2020: Nigeria's teen sprint canoeist qualifies for Olympics

results.description: Great Britain's Etienne Chappell wins his second Canoe Slalom World Cup gold of the season in Germany.
results.shortTitle: GB's Chappell claims World Cup gold
results.title: Canoe Slalom World Cup: Great Britain's Etienne Chappell wins gold in Germany

results.description: Olympic kayak champion Liam Heath secures a place at Tokyo 2020 for Britain in the K1 200m event by winning gold at the World Championships in Hungary.
results.shortTitle: GB's Heath wins gold in Hungary
results.title: Canoe Sprint World Championships: Liam Heath wins gold in Hungary

results.description: Britain's Charlotte Henshaw won two golds with compatriots Emma Wiggs and Laura Sugar picking up silvers in the World Para-canoe championships.
results.shortTitle: Henshaw wins second World Para-canoe gold
results.title: Para-canoe World Championships: Charlotte Henshaw wins second gold

results.description: Britain's Emma Wiggs successfully defends her Para-canoe VL2 200m world title with a dominant and emotional victory in Hungary.
results.shortTitle: Wiggs secures emotional world gold
results.title: Para-canoe World Championships: Emma Wiggs secures emotional gold

results.description: Pita Taufatofua, Tonga's bare-chested flagbearer at the Rio Olympics, is left behind as he makes a nightmare start to his canoe sprint career.
results.shortTitle: Taufatofua's tough start to canoe career
results.title: Canoe Sprint World Championships: Pita Taufatofua finishes last in his new sport

results.description: Tonga's Pita Taufatofua endures a difficult start to his canoe sprint career after struggling to get into position at the start line for his K1 200m race at the World Championships in Hungary.
results.shortTitle: Watch: ‘Topless Tongan' has tough canoe debut
results.title: Pita Taufatofua: 'Topless Tongan' has tough canoe debut

results.description: Charlotte Henshaw secures Britain's first medal of the 2019 Canoe Sprint and Para-canoe World Championships with VL3 gold in Hungary.
results.shortTitle: Henshaw wins Para-canoe gold in Hungary
results.title: Canoe Sprint and Para-canoe World Championships: Charlotte Henshaw wins gold in Hungary

results.description: Laurence Vincent-Lapointe will not compete at this week's Canoe Sprint World Championships after testing positive for a banned substance.
results.shortTitle: Vincent-Lapointe tests positive
results.title: Laurence Vincent-Lapointe tests positive for banned substance & will miss World Championships

results.description: Scottish Para-canoeist Hope Gordon is aiming for the Tokyo 2020 Paralympics after a life-changing operation.
results.shortTitle: 'Everybody tells me I look like a new person'
results.title: Para-canoeist Hope Gordon: 'After my amputation I felt like I could do whatever I wanted'

results.description: Hope Gordon, who crowdfunded to raise £10,000 to have her leg amputated, will represent Great Britain at next week's Para-canoe World Championships.
results.shortTitle: I crowdfunded to amputate my leg - Gordon
results.title: Hope Gordon: Para-canoeist crowdfunded to amputate her leg

results.description: Olympian Pita Taufatofua shows you how to build the upper body of a Tongan warrior as part of our #WorkoutWednesday series.
results.shortTitle: Workout Wednesday: The topless Tongan's tutorial
results.title: #WorkoutWednesday: Olympian Pita Taufatofua's topless Tongan tutorial

results.description: Two-time Olympian and former European champion Rachel Cawthorn retires from competitive canoeing.
results.shortTitle: Olympian Cawthorn retires from canoeing
results.title: Rachel Cawthorn: Two-time Olympian retires from competitive canoeing

results.description: Mallory Franklin seals her second gold medal in as many days as Olympic champion Joe Clarke also wins gold at the Canoe Slalom World Cup in London.
results.shortTitle: Franklin & Clarke win World Cup golds
results.title: Canoe Slalom World Cup: Mallory Franklin seals second gold in London as Joe Clarke also wins

thumbnail.altText: Mallory Franklin and Joe Clarke show off their medals
